name: DATAlus
description:
Control DATAlus, the little robot boi powered by the sun! He uses energy to walk and jump, and he recharges while out of shadow. Make your way through the levels without DATAlus running out of energy!

The lovely art and animations are by Katie

The one level in the game has no objective, just a nice little playground of what's been implemented so far.

Controls:

A/D for walking left/right

Space for jump

R for resetting level

Esc to quit
